metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is a use-after-free in thelzma_decompress_buf function of stream.c, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
